name: 楊元森
objective: 這是大學部學生的第二門程式語言課程，將銜接基礎的Fortran程式設計，並準備學生進入FIT-2。 本課程將以C/C++教授物件、類別、控制敘述、函數、陣列、向量、指標、字串、資料抽象化、控制元超載、繼承、及變形等課題。（學校規定之專業必修課程）
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction to Programming Design
Assignment: Hello world.
Week 2: Introduction to C++
Assignment: Celsius-Fahrenheit conversion /
Week 3-4: Variables
Assignment (W3): BMI calculation (with if-else)
Assignment (W4): Draw checkerboard
Week 5: Standard Input/Output
Assignment: Isosceles triangle check
Week 6: Control Statements, Part 1
Week 7: Control Statements, Part 2
Week 8: for loop
  Homework at home
Week 9: Midterm 
Week 10: for loop in details
  Assignments: Ex. 4.8, 4.9, 4.10, 4.11, 4.12
Week 12: while loop
Week 13: Array, Part 1
Week 14: Array, Part 2
Week 15: Function, Part 1
Week 16: Function, Part 2
Week 17: Final simulation
Week 18: Final
materials: Paul Deitel and Harvey Deitel (2010), Late Objects Version C++ How to Program 7th Edition.
